description: Defines the structured schema for transmitting a confirmed RRP activation trigger from an external domain (P1-P4) to the FIA's P-05 RRP Activation Interface (RRP-AI). Ensures message integrity and non-repudiation.

fields.name: Signal_Timestamp
fields.comment: Timestamp of the initiation of the fault condition in UTC.

fields.name: Trigger_Mask
fields.type: enum(PVLM, MPAM, ADTM, P-01 Failure Lock)
fields.comment: The specific Fault Mask Signal detected.

fields.name: Source_Agent_ID
fields.comment: The ID of the Agent issuing the RRP-AI signal.

fields.name: Verification_Hash
fields.comment: Hash of the immediate preceding operational state, attested by the Source Agent before signaling RRP.

fields.name: Signal_Signature
fields.comment: Cryptographic signature of the entire payload using the Source Agent's trusted key.
